featuresDescription.features_des1: Collect webpages and bookmarks from any browser
featuresDescription.features_des2: Oraganize your links with Collections and Tags
featuresDescription.features_des3: Create new Collections to group related Links

featuresDescription2.features_des1: Access webpages even if they are taken down.
featuresDescription2.features_des2: Safeguard your webpages against Link Rot.

featuresDescription3.features_des1: Collaborate on gathering resources under a Collection.
featuresDescription3.features_des2: Assign customizable permissions to each member.
featuresDescription3.features_des3: Easily share curated collections with the world.
